name: pocketbase-db-collection
description: Pocketbase collection adapter for TanStack DB

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/esm dist/cjs && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target browser --minify --sourcemap --bundle && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node --minify --sourcemap --bundle && bunx tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && bun -e "import {readdirSync,copyFileSync} from 'fs';readdirSync('dist/esm').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.d.ts')).forEach(f=>copyFileSync('dist/esm/'+f,'dist/cjs/'+f.replace('.d.ts','.d.cts')))"
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target browser --minify --sourcemap --bundle
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node --minify --sourcemap --bundle
scripts.dev: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target browser --watch
scripts.prerelease: bun run build && npm publish --tag beta

author: Kevin Bonnoron
